SMW Subobject for (7)High Alchemy value: 1800Examine: A scary broodoo shield.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Broodoo shield (blue)Uses infobox: ItemImage: File:Broodoo shield (blue).pngWeight: 5.443Value: 3000Version anchor: (7)Release date: 9 August 2005Item ID: 6265

The blue broodoo shield is a special members only shield. The shield requires 25 Defence and 25 Magic to wear. When created, the shield comes with 10 charges.

Broodoo shields have a passive effect when used in combat, similar to the black mask; when damage is taken it has a 10% chance of draining the opponent's Attack stat by 1, and then 5% of their remaining total. The chance for the ability to occur happens whenever an enemy attacks the player adjacently. The enemy must still have over half of its Hitpoints and the affected skill must be at its base level for it to be affected. The shield works even if you are not fighting back and at any distance from the enemy.

The number following the name of the broodoo shield represents the number of charges left on the shield, starting at 10. Every time the special attack is used, this amount will decrease by one. There is no way to recharge the shield after the charges have been depleted, but it does not affect the shield or its defensive bonuses once they are all used.

[[File:Broodoo shield (blue) detail.png|left|150px]]
The blue '''broodoo shield''' is a special [[members only]] [[shield]]. The shield requires 25 [[Defence]] and 25 [[Magic]] to wear. When created, the shield comes with 10 charges.

Broodoo shields have a passive effect when used in combat, similar to the [[black mask]]; when damage is taken it has a 10% chance of draining the opponent's [[Attack]] stat by 1, and then 5% of their remaining total. The chance for the ability to occur happens whenever an enemy attacks the player adjacently. The enemy must still have over half of its [[Hitpoints]] and the affected skill must be at its base level for it to be affected. The shield works even if you are not fighting back and at any distance from the enemy.

The number following the name of the broodoo shield represents the number of charges left on the shield, starting at 10. Every time the special attack is used, this amount will decrease by one. '''There is no way to recharge the shield after the charges have been depleted''', but it does not affect the shield or its defensive bonuses once they are all used.
